May 2, 2025:Sun Pharma's stock closed at ₹1832.30, marking a 1.48% rise.

April 10, 2025:A US court ruled in Sun Pharma's favor, vacating a preliminary injunction that had restricted the launch of LEQSELVI. This drug treats autoimmune hair loss (alopecia areata).

May 8, 2025:Sun Pharma launched a corporate brand campaign emphasizing its impact on healthcare, highlighting that 1,000 Sun Pharma medicines are prescribed globally every minute.

May 22, 2025:Sun Pharma reported its Q4 and full year FY25 financial results. Key highlights include:

Robust revenue growth in Q4 FY25, but a dip in reported net profit due to exceptional charges related to US operations restructuring.

Proposed a final dividend of ₹5.50 per share for FY25, bringing the total dividend for the year to ₹16.00 per share.

Announced the appointment of Ms. Vidhi Shanghvi as a Whole-time Director.

May 23, 2025:Sun Pharma's shares declined nearly 5% in early trade following the earnings announcement and disclosure of one-time restructuring expenses.

May 28, 2025:Sun Pharma's share price had fallen by -0.28%.
